content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with a full inventory of coal (50/50) and currently no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone furnace (position (2.0, 0.0)) with a full inventory of coal (47/50) and currently no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone furnace (position (4.0, 0.0)) with a full inventory of coal (50/50) and currently no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone furnace (position (6.0, 0.0)) with a partial inventory of coal (3/50) and currently no ingredients to smelt.

### Copper plate mine at position (x)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position ) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace at position (0, 0) is full (50/50 items).
  
### Errors when attempting to insert items not present in inventory
- Make sure to check your inventory before trying to insert items into the furnace. The error indicates that there was no iron ore available in the inventory when attempting to insert it into the furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
